title: Can somebody explain this to me? (Dynamic queue role pref)
body:
I was just in queue, finally found a game (after 20 minutes mind you, in effing bronze), got my main role, life was sweet. Went through all the motions of banning and then some twat dodges at the last moment (somebody from my team), placed back in queue, presumably with the same people (?), queue pops again, completely different group of names and I'm in my secondary position now.

Can somebody explain this to me? I'm really sick of the whole Dynamic queue system in general, wait times (in general), the way it seems to just not give any f*ks about your main preference and just prioritizes wait time instead and don't get me started on the whole "support" and "fill" clusterfook. But even this seems a little strange to me...

replies.body: It just happened again... identical situation. Riot what the shit?
